title: French Omelette
tagline: Silky eggs, pale yellow, classic technique
steps: Beat eggs with fork until just combined. Season.
Heat 8-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high. Add butter.
Stir eggs with fork while shaking pan. Small curds form.
When mostly set but still wet on top, stop stirring.
Tilt pan and roll omelette onto plate.
Should be pale yellow outside, creamy inside.
source: Jacques Pépin / Serious Eats (Jacques Pépin classic)
